1274860.name: Like old times
1274860.description:
A top-down looter shooter set in a post-apocalyptic, nuclear war-torn world. There are plenty of hazards and dangers waiting for you in the wasteland - other hostile survivors, mutants and radiation-altered fauna or flora.

Key Features:

  • Guns, lot of guns - randomly generated weapons + unique weapons

  • Story - the story of the game is set in the near future of central europe.

  • Art style - stylized graphic low poly style

  • Vehicles - several vehicles will be available for faster movement through the wasteland

  • Perks - a perk system that allows you to play according to your needs.
1274860.supported_languages:
英语*, 捷克语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
